column4: PLEASE GUYS! i need some help with the wireless in Ubuntu... right now i am forced to use Vizta :(:(
What wireless card do you have, what version of ubuntu are you using, and what seems to be the problem?
i have ubuntu 8.10 with and Atheros... it cannot detect any wireless network
Could you provide me the model number of the atheros card? It'll help me search the forums.
thanks to you ;) lol sorry if i didnt post it before

Ok, good news. :-) You  need to compile the drivers for your card and use those drivers. That should fix the problem. Here's the link: http://www.ubuntugeek.com/how-to-get-atheros-ar5007eg-or-ar242x-wireless-cards-may-be-other-models-working-in-ubuntu-810-intrepid-ibex.html
THANK YOU SOOOOOOOOOOOO MUCH... now i shutdown Vista and try with ubuntu...thanks again :)
http://www.ubuntu.com/getubuntu/releasenotes/810 <- There's a section on your card there as well.
if you ever pass by southern Italy, i owe you a beer ;)
np. :-) I've got a friend in Torino btw. Beautiful country, Italy. Best of luck with your wireless, mate.
